issue.title: Atlas v3 URDF has no collision models

content.raw: Ah, I didn't use the new urdf files, I just added in the stl meshes and modified the current urdfs to look for the new meshes.  I wasn't sure how the new atlas_description package (post-catkin) mapped to the old one - the directories have all changed.
content.html: Ah, I didn't use the new urdf files, I just added in the stl meshes and modified the current urdfs to look for the new meshes. I wasn't sure how the new atlas_description package (post-catkin) mapped to the old one - the directories have all changed.
